claims.claim_text: 2025-11-03 — Study authors reported that 18 Canadian pediatric tertiary care hospitals responded to the MHP survey (100% response rate) and 13 hospitals had pediatric-specific massive hemorrhage protocol (MHP) content (count = 13 hospitals).

claims.claim_text: 2025-11-04 — The survey found trauma accounted for 54% of MHP activations across responding hospitals (54 percent of activations attributed to trauma).
